prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a unique meditation pose and a calming color scheme.
Imagine a tiny humanoid Pokemon with a round shape and a focus on mind powers.
Show me a small Pokemon that blends blue and gray colors, perfect for a tranquil forest setting.
Generate an adorable, bipedal Pokemon with distinct curled ears and a peaceful expression.
Design a psychic fighter Pokemon with a serene demeanor and a striking blue color palette.
Make a compact Pokemon that represents harmony and mental strength, featuring soft curves and gentle colors.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies tranquility and balance, with a unique blend of blue and white.
